prompt.content: What specific financial instruments does GE have classified as Level 3 in FY 2008? Separate the different instruments and the total amount. Express the answer in $M rounded to 2 decimal places of precision

messages.content: [{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Amounts are stated as retrieved from GEâ€™s FY 2008 Form 10-K and presented in $M"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Investment securities: $12,956.00M"},{"criteria":"Derivatives (assets): $1,142.00M","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Other assets (private equity investments and loans designated under the fair value option): $1,105.00M"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Derivatives (liabilities): $166.00M"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Total Level 3 assets = $15,203.00M"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Total Level 3 liabilities = $166.00M"},{"criteria":"Combined Level 3 (assets + liabilities) = $15,369.00M","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"All amounts are expressed in $M and rounded to two decimal places","operator":"correctness"}]
